name: maryaam

wishText: I hope your special day is filled with joy, laughter, and lots of fun! You are growing up so fast, May this year bring you incredible adventures, new discoveries, and all the happiness in the world.  ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to maryamm! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, dumbass.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
